title: GQD-PAN based high-performance supercapacitor – an approach towards wealth from waste

Managing non-biodegradable polymeric waste and search for efficient energy materials are growing concerns which needs immediate attention. The two highly demanding problems were solved together by synthesizing nonpolar Graphene Quantum...
